definition: to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus
leftovers from a meal/fig. remnants handed down from others

sentences.english: Problem with Orphans A gang of orphans scoured the city for scraps to live on.
sentences.chinese: 孤儿问题一群孤儿在城里四处搜索残羹剩饭混时度日。

sentences.english: The table was littered with remains of eatables.
sentences.chinese: 餐桌上到处是残羹剩菜。

sentences.english: You will eat the scraps that he gives you and you will live 30 years.
sentences.chinese: 你要吃他的残羹剩饭，活上30年，这就是你的归宿。

sentences.english: Occasionally the dog will get scraps of bread and meat from the restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 这只狗偶尔能从饭馆得到些残羹剩饭。

sentences.english: He brewed a pot of soup from the leftovers.
sentences.chinese: 他用残羹剩菜煮了一锅汤。

sentences.english: Using waste food to generate electricity is a good way to save the environment.
sentences.chinese: 利用残羹剩饭来发电是个不错的方法。

sentences.english: A jackal watches from a distance, hoping for a few scraps when the lions are done.
sentences.chinese: 远处，一只豺狗暗中注视，觊觎狮子的残羹剩饭。

sentences.english: Also, do not feed your pet table scraps that contain onions in any shape or form.
sentences.chinese: 也不要喂给宠物任何含洋葱的残羹剩饭。

sentences.english: Learn how to use leftovers in recipes.
sentences.chinese: 学会如何使用残羹剩饭。

sentences.english: It was like eating leftovers from a submarine. (See pictures of Japan and the world.)
sentences.chinese: 它实在像是潜水艇里的残羹剩饭。

sentences.english: Many cities and states are suing in an attempt to get some of their money back.
sentences.chinese: 许多城市和州企图捞回来一点残羹。

sentences.english: Also, do not feed your pet table scraps that contain onions in any shape or form. And it is always if your cat or dog begins
sentences.chinese: 也不要喂给宠物任何含洋葱的残羹剩饭。

sentences.english: Farmers feed kitchen waste to the pigs.
sentences.chinese: 农民们用厨房里的残羹剩饭喂猪。

sentences.english: Hear Marni and Ella talk about leftovers.
sentences.chinese: 听听玛尼和艾拉谈论残羹剩饭。

sentences.english: Survivors in rat's galleries raping the poisoned ground.
sentences.chinese: 幸存者们在爬满老鼠的走廊上抢夺地上的残羹。

sentences.english: Waiters put their leftovers in the garbage can.
sentences.chinese: 侍者把残羹剩饭倒入泔脚桶里。

definition: leftovers from a meal/fig. remnants handed down from others
cups and dishes in complete disorder (idiom); after a riotous drinking party
spoilt tea, leftover food (idiom); remains after a meal/crumbs from the feast
food and drink/food to accompany wine
to wolf down one's food (idiom); to devour ravenously/to gorge oneself
to eat (of bird or animal)/to feed
in a mess/scattered about/in complete disorder
